title: Error 404
body: When I was almost done with my patching on the pbe (around 80% or so) i got an error code 404. It tells me to restart the client and try again, but it's not working. Please help

replies.body: The 004 errors like the one in your screenshot almost always point to an issue with your OS's admin settings. Make sure League has access to update and patch it's game files by following the steps in the [**permissions guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions).
